title: Gemma Collins shares epic mash up of herself and Lady Gaga's hit Telephone
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Diva Forever legend Gemma Collins loves to treat her fans to a bit of comedy - and her latest Instagram offering is no exception.

The GC has cut up one of her own phone calls, made during an episode of Big Brother , with hit maker Lady Gaga's chart topper Telephone.

The part of the song Gemma used features Lady Gaga on the phone, complaining that she can't hear whoever is at the other end - in this case, Gemma.

"Hello?" Gemma answers as the phone rings.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Lady Gaga sings into her phone: "Hello, hello? Baby, you called, I can't hear a thing. I've got no service in the club, you see, see."

"Who are you?" the GC demands.

"What, what did you say? You're breaking up on me! Sorry, I can not hear you, I'm kinda busy," sings Gaga.

(Image: Instagram)

Gemma slams down the phone, and a voice off screen asks what she said.

"Just talking s**t!" cries Gemma.

Fans have been loving the former Towie star's post, and the comedic chops of fan age @gemmareacts, who made the video.

The 38 year-old wrote: "HELLO @ladygaga babes why it take you so long to call. Sending positive vibes to all, have a wonderful week @gemmareacts."

While most have been replying with laugh cry emojis, one wrote: "This is too flipping funny."

Another laughed: "Found this too funny!"

A third gushed over Gaga and the GC in one clip, writing: "OMG my two faves!"
description: The GC shared a clip with her legions of fans of herself on the phone intercut with Lady Gaga's singing
